title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 348.3 - Investigations of fraud
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 348.3 - Investigations of fraud

State Regulations

Investigations of fraud shall be promptly made, but shall
be conducted by lawful means only, without infringing upon the civil rights of
individuals. Under no circumstances, shall force, threat of force or false
statements be used to obtain entry into a household or to obtain evidence of
any nature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
348.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
